about me

Web Developer with a background in graphic design, skilled in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Proficient in frameworks like Jekyll and JQuery, I specialize in crafting visually appealing websites with a focus on user experience. Committed to delivering customized solutions that meet clients' needs and elevate their online presence. Let's work together to create a standout digital experience for your project.
